item.title: After 15 years, Jill Biden teaches final class at Virginia community college
item.description: First lady Jill Biden has taught her last class at Northern Virginia Community College, where she has worked as a professor since 2009.

item.title: Trump picks ally and ex-NFL star Herschel Walker as Bahamas ambassador
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump backed the Heisman Trophy winnerâ€™s failed 2022 Senate campaign in Georgia, which was plagued by scandals.

item.title: Democrats, readying to battle Trump, shake up House committees
item.description: House Democrats on Tuesday elected new leaders on three key committees, a shake-up that signals a generational shift as they prepare to take on Trump

item.title: Electoral college elects Donald Trump as next president
item.description: The gatherings unfolded uneventfully, unlike four years ago when alternate electors for Trump convened in seven states that he lost.

item.title: UnitedHealthcare CEO shooting suspect indicted on murder charges
item.description: Luigi Mangione, 26, was indicted by a grand jury in New York and charged with 11 counts, including murder in the first degree.
